definition: ruthless/fierce/ferocious/determined/to harden (one's heart)/old variant of 很[hen3]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: He developed into the ruthless operator his grandfather had been.
sentences.chinese: 他辦事變得同他祖父一樣心狠手辣。

sentences.english: The Israelis fear that Iran will be as ruthless as they have been, and assume this.
sentences.chinese: 以色列害怕並且假定伊朗會像他們一樣心狠手辣。

sentences.english: The teachers’ unions have an impressive record of terminating reformers.
sentences.chinese: 教師工會對付改革者是出了名的心狠手辣。

sentences.english: I'll not fold means, bee a ruthless woman.
sentences.chinese: 我會不折手段，變成一個心狠手辣的女人。

definition: to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom)/fig. to kill people like flies
lit. strung through and filled with evil (idiom); filled with extreme evil/replete with vice/guilty of monstrous crimes
